title: How to Measure Distance on Android

steps.title: Search for "measure distance" in the Google Play store.
steps.content: Search for "measure distance" in the Google Play store.

steps.title: Select an app there, such as "Smart Measure."
steps.content: Select an app there, such as "Smart Measure."

steps.title: Click "Install" to install the app onto your phone.
steps.content: Click "Install" to install the app onto your phone.

steps.title: Aim the cross-hairs at the very bottom of the object you want to measure, right at the point that it meets the floor.
steps.content: Aim the cross-hairs at the very bottom of the object you want to measure, right at the point that it meets the floor.

steps.title: Hit the button in the bottom right corner of the app to take a picture of the object and get its distance from you.
steps.content: Hit the button in the bottom right corner of the app to take a picture of the object and get its distance from you. The picture and distance will appear in the top right corner of the app.
